ratings.comment: she knows her stuff. epiphany stacked on epiphanies

Professor Oh was knowledgable, approachable, and understanding. She did a good job giving us an overview of the complex material. Exams, group projects, and weekly reading logs are really not that hard if you do the reading and pay attention. I will say though that the readings are a bit long at times
Professor Oh is an engaging, will help you out, and is easy on the eyes.
Intro to Korean Cinema is a fantastic class to take for film lovers.

I took Lit Tran 374 with her. She's super intelligent and gets the students to really think critically. I thought she was super easy but at the same time there were only 20 people in my class. She wrote me a letter of recommendation and she was super friendly. Her class is very interesting and I would definitely recommend her!!
Intersting class. Demand for essay is high. In order to do well in the class, you have to really go deep in the topic. Also, be critical on what you see and what you write.
